amendment.description: An amendment numbered 37 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to prohibit funds for the W87-1 modification program to enable additional analysis of the underlying program justifications, planning and budget.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds for the W87-1 Modification Program, which seeks to develop a new nuclear warhead.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 299 (Roll no. 545).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 299 (Roll no. 545).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
